node.display_long_description:
How work should be.

Spatial brings people together for hangouts, immersive presentations, team planning, product reviews, & brainstorms.

During a time when collaboration feels disconnected, unclear, and inefficient, Spatial enables you to - 

SIT NEXT TO EACH OTHER FROM ACROSS THE WORLD
- Create your lifelike 3D avatar from a selfie in seconds
- Your avatar talks, moves, and interacts, mirroring in-person collaborative sessions

MAKE YOUR ROOM YOUR MONITOR & YOUR HANDS YOUR MOUSE
- Fill your room with information, defying the limits of your 2D screen
- Enjoy beautiful immersive 3D environments 
- Express and share ideas w/ whiteboarding, notes, & photo/3D model search 

USE ALL YOUR FAVORITE TOOLS
- In-app browser + screen sharing
- Seamlessly upload many 2D/3D file types 
- Integrate with Slack, Google Drive, and more

JOIN FROM ANY DEVICE
- VR + AR (Quest, Nreal, HoloLens, Magic Leap)
- Mobile (iOS + Android) & Web

nodes.title: Spatial 2.0! Host Abilities, LiDAR Scanning, Spatial Audio, Selfies & More!
nodes.body_text:
Learn about Spatial's new features in version 2.0!!!

üîê New Pro Features:

üé§üññ HOST TOOLS: Room creators will now have greater control over the room and its participants with the abilities to mute users, remove participants, enable feature specific permissions, & revert the room to its last save.



üôå New Free Features:
 
üì± LiDAR Scanning: With Spatial's mobile app on an iPhone 12 or iPad Pro use your LiDAR and TrueDepth cameras to create point clouds & meshes you can add directly into Spatial.



üëÇ Spatial Audio: Turn on Spatial Audio & the farther you are from someone the harder it becomes to hear them. Cocktail parties & breakout sessions here you come! üíÉ



üé•  Moveable Spectator Camera: Control the view of those watching from the web app. Show them what you're talking about, give them a tour, & look right at them.



ü§≥üèæ Selfie Stick: Take pictures in Spatial, of yourself, of a friend, of your co-workers, or any of the content in the room!



üìö Content menu: Curate your content from the web app, click the x to hide any content you don't want to appear in headset. From the web app you can now also add this recent content to the room.



Additional Features:
- Duplicate Content
- Scribble color and brush size customization
- Change your Team's name
- We added a loop button to videos
- Bulk invite emails to rooms from the web app
- PointCloud .PCD File Support
- upload GLTF models from Mobile
- Webcams & Screenshares can be duplicated

Join our public event on Friday 2/26 , get a demo of these new features, and ask the Spatial team questions ü§ù

Sign Up or Upgrade at spatial.io

Need Help? Visit support.spatial.io

Join our Slack Community https://guestinvite.spatial.io/

node.reviewDescription: This app was a joy at first. Since going into lockdown, our studio has not had the possibility to meet our professors for in-person teaching, until some of us started using spatial. Now we can show, move, and look at our designs again in 3D "in person" - which is amazing now that all physical models are out of the question. However I am having massive troubles with importing a large amount of files into the rooms. Once I reach a certain numbers of 3D objects, the whole room starts moving after my head movement and there's no stopping it. I have to quit the whole app in order no to get completely sea sick. I currently have a room I can't enter due to it being  completely glitched. If these issues could be fixed I would give 5 of 5 stars. Cus the collaboration aspect is brilliant.

website_page_meta.description:
Spatial brings people together for hangouts, immersive presentations, team planning, product reviews, & brainstorms.

Spatial enables you to:

- Sit next to each other from across the world by creating a lifelike avatar from a selfie in seconds
- Fill your room with  2D/3D content, including screen share, browser, sticky notes and whiteboarding
- Integrate with tools like Slack or Google
- Join from VR, AR, Web, & Mobile
